title: Hudson Hawk (1991) (Bruce Willis, Danny Aiello)
description:
HUDSON HAWK - 1991

IMDb Rating: 5.3
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0102070/

  Bruce Willis is Eddie "The Hawk" Hawkins, the world's most famous cat burglar, who, after 10 years in prison, is ready to go straight. But it's not going to be easy for The Hawk. The mob and the CIA have conspired to blackmail Eddie and his partner (Danny Aiello) into stealing three da Vinci masterpieces from the most heavily-guarded museums in the world. Sounds simple, right? WRONG! While trying to steal the goods, Hawk falls in love with a beautiful but schizophrenic nun (Andie MacDowell) and is relentlessly pursued by the greedy and powerful Minerva and Darwin Mayflower (Sandra  Bernhard, Richard E. Grant), who want the artworks as part of their twisted plot to ruin the world's economy.

  Starring: Bruce Willis, Danny Aiello, Andie MacDowell, Sandra Bernhard, James Coburn, Richard E. Grant, David Caruso.

  Directed by: Michael Lehmann.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length:  1hr. 40min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 720 x  416

  Frame Rate: 23fps
